General.Name: Silver Tiger Metals Inc
General.Description: Silver Tiger Metals Inc. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Mexico. The company primarily explores for gold and silver, as well as for copper, lead, and zinc deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the El Tigre property that covers an area of 28,414 hectares located in Sonora, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Oceanus Resources Corporation and changed its name to Silver Tiger Metals Inc. in May 2020. Silver Tiger Metals Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Halifax, Canada.
General.Address: 2446 Purcells Cove Road, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3V 1G3
